item.title: Omg ! omg ! omg
item.dc:creator: @badboyzack10 badboyzack10
item.description:
@badboyzack10 wrote:

i am trying to make this get my str to 150 it only goes to 118 dno why this is everything i thing

[code=abap] public void drinkPremium(int itemId, int replaceItem, int slot, boolean rest) {
c.startAnimation(829);
c.playerItems[slot] = replaceItem + 1;
c.getItems().resetItems(3214);
c.playerLevel[2] += (c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]) * .51);
if (rest)
c.playerLevel[2] += 1;
if (c.playerLevel[2] > c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]))
c.playerLevel[2] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(2);
if (rest)
restoreStats();
}

public void enchanceStat1(int skillID, boolean sup) {
	c.playerLevel[skillID] += getPremiumStat(skillID, sup);
	c.getPA().refreshSkill(skillID);
}[/code]

public int getPremiumStat(int skill, boolean sup) { int increaseBy = 0; if (sup) increaseBy = (int)(c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])*.50); else increaseBy = (int)(c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])*.51) + 1; if (c.playerLevel[skill] + increaseBy > c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) + increaseBy + 1) { return c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) + increaseBy - c.playerLevel[skill]; } return increaseBy; }
plz help !!!

Read full topic
